remarks: The power class of the union of two classes equals the union of their power classes, iff one class is a subclass of the other.  Part of Exercise 7(b) of [Enderton] p. 28.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 30-Sep-2018.)
statement: pwunim $p |- ( ( A C_ B \/ B C_ A ) -> ~P ( A u. B ) = ( ~P A u. ~P B ) ) $.
